plugins.prepareCmd: sed -i "s/Version: .*/Version: ${nextRelease.version}/" GradeBook.php && sed -i "s/AN_GRADEBOOK_VERSION', '[^']*'/AN_GRADEBOOK_VERSION', '${nextRelease.version}'/" GradeBook.php && sed -i "s/Stable tag: .*/Stable tag: ${nextRelease.version}/" readme.txt && sed -i "s/\"version\": \"[^\"]*\"/\"version\": \"${nextRelease.version}\"/" package.json && bash scripts/update-readme-changelog.sh ${nextRelease.version}
